CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c) , "Accounting Firm", "CPA" , "Strategic Accountant Firm", "CPA" , "Bank", "Bank Employee" , "Financial Services", "Financial Advisor" , "Broker", "Financial Advisor" , "Broker Dealer", "Money Manager" , "Insurance Broker", "Independent Agent" , "Insurance Carrier", "IIA General" , "MSP Partner", "MSP Partner" , "Health Insurance Broker", "Health Insurance Broker" , "Full Service Agency", "Insurance Agent" , "PEO Broker", "PEO Broker" , "Property & Casualty Broker", "P&C Insurance Broker" , "Business Consultant", "Professional Services Consultant" , "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What's the default value of the Primary Referral Type we set on the Referral Contact based on the Referral Source Business Type?
CustomField.label: Default Ctct Primary Type
